findings.title: Unused diff() function in BalanceDeltaLibrary()
findings.description: The diff() function in BalanceDelta.sol is defined but never used anywhere in the codebase. This increases code bloat and maintenance overhead without providing any functionality. The cause is likely leftover code from a fork of Uniswap v4 that was not cleaned up. While this does not pose a security risk, it reduces code clarity and may confuse auditors or developers. The impact is limited to code quality and gas efficiency (minimal, if any).
